com.mousebird.maply

Class MaplyRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.MaplyRenderer

  • public class MaplyRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    The renderer encapsulates the OpenGL ES specific rendering. This is opaque to the toolkit user.
